column4: In any building, the choice of interior materials helps define
and redefine luxury.
Saint Gobain's products constantly strive to transform interior spaces to
the ones that exude vibrancy and comfort of wellbeing, presenting
Planet Lac Evolution, a premium lacquered glass by Saint Goman
that has revolutionized interiors in renowned landmark buildings across the
world.
The new generation durable glass unites colored lacquer with the
brilliance of glass to give interiors artistic excellence and create
vibrant living spaces suitable for all interior surface design needs.
Plany Lac Evolution empowers designers with unlimited design possibilities.
Available in a range of colors and sizes.
Plany Lac Evolution can be used in a number of
applications like partitions, wall cladding, splashbacks, shutters, writing boards etcetera.
Saint Gobain's World Glass complex in Chennai manufacturers plani Lac
evolution in one of its kind manufacturing process from the
first level of production, choosing and handling base glass with
minimal human intervention.
Ensure every process is meticulously handled, the base completely refined
and cleaned to perfection and then dispatched to the next
division for bonding.
The key process of bonding the Planilac lacquer with glass
is done by the use of sealant sprays that ensure
consistency in the final product.
Planilac lacquer is applied on the glass through the curtain
coating process for an even and uniform coating with precision
that you would notice only in high speed photography.
Continuous online testing is undertaken to ensure that the glass
under production is in line with the prescribed quality parameters.
These vital stages involve patented processes that ensure only the
best product is delivered.
The process of curing of glass goes through 12 different
chambers and is controlled for testing by pyrometers.
The glass that conforms to the highest quality standards and
that can be ranked the best in its class meets
its match with the laser branding.
Every batch of glass is put to stringent lab tests
that consists of Tabor tests, Color value test, high humidity
test to ensure that only the best comes out of
the state-of-the-art manufacturing.
The glass is then dispatched to the markets, to the
hands of architects and designers around the world to enable
them craft spaces like no mother with plenty like evolution.
Explore infinite possibilities and transform your spaces to the ones
that celebrate modernity in vibrancy.
